about_the_game:
This pack recreates the Type B express train passenger cars as used by Deutsche Reichsbahn in the former GDR. The included liveries represent the cars as they operated in 1960s and 1970s. The models include passenger view and dynamic numbering.

Included cars

  • AB4ge 1st / 2nd class green / grey
  • A4ge 1st class green / grey
  • B4ge 2nd class green / grey
  • ABME 1st / 2nd class green / beige / fawn
  • Ame 1st class green / beige / fawn
  • Bme 2nd class green / beige / fawn
detailed_description:
This pack recreates the Type B express train passenger cars as used by Deutsche Reichsbahn in the former GDR. The included liveries represent the cars as they operated in 1960s and 1970s. The models include passenger view and dynamic numbering.

Included cars

  • AB4ge 1st / 2nd class green / grey
  • A4ge 1st class green / grey
  • B4ge 2nd class green / grey
  • ABME 1st / 2nd class green / beige / fawn
  • Ame 1st class green / beige / fawn
  • Bme 2nd class green / beige / fawn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows® Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor:Processor: 2.8 GHz Core 2 Duo (3.2 GHz Core 2 Duo recommended), AMD Athlon MP (multiprocessor variant or comparable processors)
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:512 MB with Pixel Shader 3.0 (AGP PCIe only)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:6 GB HD space
  • Sound:Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics:Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
